info.name: Organization
info.summary: Manages organizations, subscriptions, and plans for multi-tenant Nextcloud deployments.
info.description: This application provides organization management functionality including: - Organization entities linked to Nextcloud groups - Subscription plans with member limits, project limits, and storage quotas - Subscription lifecycle management (active, paused, cancelled, expired) - Subscription history logging for audit trails - Middleware to enforce subscription status on protected routes
info.author: Custom Development
